BasicScenarioGenerator - Class in cli
Generates a basic scenario with a predefined set of users (customers, restaurants, couriers, manager) and associated data like menus and dishes for testing or demonstration purposes.
BasicScenarioGenerator() - Constructor for class cli.BasicScenarioGenerator
Constructs a BasicScenarioGenerator and initializes the sets for customers, restaurants, managers, couriers, and the user map.
